name: Story of Nuclear
description:
游戏将模拟铀原子和钚原子的(魔法)核裂变过程

The game will simulate the (magical) nuclear fission process of uranium and plutonium atoms.

操作：将鼠标放在中子上，按住左键拖动来发射，任何经过发射台捕捉的中子不会消失。

Operation: put the mouse on the neutron, press and hold the left button to drag, release to launch, any neutrons captured by the launchpad will not disappear.

 

按F6跳过到下一关。如果不管用就多按几次。

Press F6 jump to next level. If it doesn't work, just try few more times.

 

Tips：

撞击到黄色铀235，爆炸。

Hit yellow uranium 235, exploded.

撞击到灰色铀238，吸收一个中子，变成红色铀239。

When hits grey uranium 238, absorbs the neutron and turns red uranium 239.

撞击到红色铀239，衰变为绿色钚，中子被弹开。

When hits red uranium 239, decays into green plutonium and the neutron bounce off.

撞击到绿色钚，大爆炸！

Hit the green plutonium, Big Bang!

裂变产物不会和任何物质发生反应！

Fission products do not react with any material!

目标：让所有黄色铀235爆炸吧！！！

Target: let all yellow uranium 235 explode!
